description: This file provides a helper class for managing notes and tags in a SQLite database within a Flutter/Dart project. It includes database initialization, CRUD operations for notes and tags, and query methods for retrieving notes with filtering options.

classes.name: DBHelper
classes.description: A static helper class providing database initialization, and CRUD operations for notes and tags, including querying by tags and search terms.

methods.name: db
methods.description: Lazy-initialized getter for the singleton database instance.

methods.name: initDB
methods.description: Initializes the SQLite database, creating tables for notes, tags, and note-tag relationships.

methods.name: insertNote
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database and saves its associated tags.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note and resets its associated tags.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note and its related tags associations.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Retrieves notes based on optional search query and tag filter, returning a list of Note objects.

methods.name: insertTag
methods.description: Inserts a new tag into the tags table.

methods.name: getAllTags
methods.description: Fetches all tags from the database.

methods.name: getTagsForNote
methods.description: Retrieves tags associated with a specific note.

methods.name: _saveNoteTags
methods.description: Associates a list of tags with a specific note in the database.

methods.name: getNotesByTag
methods.description: Retrieves all notes associated with a specific tag.
